other_tests.findings: Anti-amphiphysin antibody tested positive in cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).
other_tests.changes_over_time: CSF analysis remained unchanged during the second admission.

other_tests.findings: Positive in both cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) and serum.
Revealed IgG antibody to Purkinje cells of the monkey cerebellum and dentate gyrus glia cells of the monkey hippocampus.
